project_descr: This Global Programme was created to support Governments to achieve transformational change by using NDC implementation as a mechanism to scale up investments in climate change and deliver sustainable development.

outputs.output_descr: GSU will provide technical assistance to the countries to implement their NDC implementation, as provide guidance and support on communications, advocacy and operations.

document_name: 1 Signed Prodoc_ NDC support Programme_15 June 2017
